title: How to Make Snowball Cake

steps.headline: Add orange juice, lemon juice and sugar.
Refrigerate until thick as egg white.
Whip one pint (2 cups) whipping cream, using chilled bowl and beaters.
Coat sides of 3 qt.
steps.description: bowl or 10" tube pan with vegetable shortening and line with waxed paper.

steps.headline: Break angel food cake into 1 inch (2.5 cm) pieces.
steps.description: Alternate layers with gelatin/whipping cream mixture.

steps.headline: Invert onto cake plate and frost with 1/2 pint (1 cup) cream whipped.

text: Soften gelatin in cold water.  Add boiling water.  Stir to dissolve completely.  Add orange juice, lemon juice and sugar.  Stir until sugar is dissolved.  Refrigerate until thick as egg white.  Whip one pint (2 cups) whipping cream, using chilled bowl and beaters.  Fold into thickened gelatin mixture.  Coat sides of 3 qt. bowl or 10" tube pan with vegetable shortening and line with waxed paper. Break angel food cake into 1 inch (2.5 cm) pieces. Alternate layers with gelatin/whipping cream mixture. Chill overnight or 6 to 8 hours.  Invert onto cake plate and frost with 1/2 pint (1 cup) cream whipped.  Cover generously with coconut.  Finished.
